programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: Hallmark cruisers meet their favorite stars and enjoy a tree lighting at sea.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's pregnant daughter, Rebecca, pales at the thought of childbirth.

programme.desc: Rose, who was adopted, meets her biological father while Sophia is in the hospital.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van apply for food stamps; against her better judgement, Reba accepts working at her ex-husband's office.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba accepts a job reporting to Barbra Jean in Brock's dental office; Cheyenne goes to college; Van stays home to watch Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba takes a full-time job, Jake starts calling Barbra Jean "Mommy.".

programme.desc: Cheyenne convinces her mother to try speed-dating after Reba has a disastrous night on the town.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba invites her beau home to meet the family; Brock and the children attend Barbra Jean's family reunion in Fisheye Bottom.

programme.desc: Reba invites her beau home to meet the family; Brock and the children attend Barbra Jean's family reunion in Fisheye Bottom.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers return and put on a holiday pageant for young Thomas while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's childhood nanny pays a visit; Sophia's matchmaking irks Dorothy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy receives pressure because she refuses to give a passing grade to the school football star.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy does not pay heed to Sophia's advice about the rekindled romance with Stan.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne and Roz pose as the wives of the Crane brothers to hoodwink Daphne's now-successful ex-fiance.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Pleasantly surprised by the woman Roz set him up with on a blind date, Frasier ends up competing with Bulldog for her attentions.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba takes a full-time job, Jake starts calling Barbra Jean "Mommy.".

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne convinces her mother to try speed-dating after Reba has a disastrous night on the town.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns she will be spending Christmas Eve alone; Cheyenne and Van try to start a holiday tradition, but their plan backfires.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Everyone takes turns in front of the camera to create a video family album for Cheyenne's baby, Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba tries to sell her engagement ring online, Brock bids in hope of getting the ring back; Van decides it is time to buy Cheyenne a ring.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean are furious when Brock reveals he had a vasectomy; Cheyenne and Van move out of the house in protest when Reba lays down new rules following a pregnancy scare.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers with a disdain for Christmas make a holiday pact to pretend to be a couple to ease their holiday complications. As they spend more time together, the phony couple begin to experience the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: Sara reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Josh, when she returns to her hometown to help her mother move. When Sara makes a surprising discovery, she and Josh forge a bold plan for an upcoming Christmas concert that takes them back to their musical roots.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: Crashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: Maggie and Sam are crashing Christmas. When he proposes that they team up against his sister's perfect Christmas, neither of them are prepared for the blended family challenges that lie ahead.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.
